string.text: The Dogs will no longer interfere with the Stalkers to go through the Wild Territory. Now the output can take any group.
Obtained for the elimination of Tachenko detachment. Duty will not forgive you.
The liquidation of General Tachenko detachment weakened the presence of Duty in Zaton.
Obtained for the elimination of General Voronin. Duty will not forgive you.
The Duty faction was left headless without its leader, a great chance to destroy the weakened group.
Obtained for the elimination of Lukas. Freedom will not forgive you.
The Liberty faction was left headless without its leader, this is your chance.
Destroy all military airborne units at Chernobyl
The military operation failed, the "Monolith" thanks you. You destroyed units: Quartet, Falcon, Vulture, Owl, Harrier, Hawk, Kite and Kestrel.
